# Python code

```{python}
# 
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import statsmodels.formula.api as sms
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.style.use('seaborn-whitegrid')
#
COST_TEXT = pd.read_csv('~/Dropbox/Mi Mac (Mac Pro de Julia패n)/Documents/GitHub/EcoMetricsRPy/COST_TEXT.csv')
# 
plt.scatter(COST_TEXT['Q'], COST_TEXT['COST'], marker='o', color='black')
plt.show()
#
model1 = sms.ols('COST ~ Q + I(Q**2)', data=COST_TEXT)
print(model1.fit().summary())
```
